Attacks.Name: Foul Play
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dark Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Umbreon can make a short move.

Superpowers.Name: Synchronize
Superpowers.Effect: When Umbreon is given a special condition by an enemy effect, the character that caused the effect is also given that condition if they are within Range 3 of Umbreon.

Superpowers.Name: Moonlight
Superpowers.Effect: Remove up to 3 damage from Umbreon.

Attacks.Name: Payback
Attacks.Effect: If Umbreon has taken damage this round, add 2 dice to this attack.
